sentence.Network_en: We should run all undertakings industrially and thriftily.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们要勤俭办一切事业.

sentence.Network_en: Barium as barite ( barium sulfate ) is used industrially as a white pigment for paint.
sentence.Network_cn: 钡以重晶石形态 ( 硫酸钡 ) 在工业上用作油漆的白色涂料.

sentence.Network_en: Indeed, most industrially significant synthetic chemicals are derived from petroleum sources.
sentence.Network_cn: 实际上, 大多数工业上重要的化学合成物均源自石油.
